title: Deep red
creator_credit: Rizzoli Film, Salvatore Argento, Spettacoli and Dario Argento
brief_description: Dario Argento’s blood thirsty thriller stars British actor David Hemmings. Witnessing the violent murder of a young parapsychologist, Hemmings embarks on a search for the murderer by following the trail of blood and destruction. “Deep red” is a film of relentless tension, with a bizarre ending and contains some of cinema’s most gripping film sequences. Italian dialogue. Dubbed in English.
